name: Twiter hide auto-images in unopened tweets
description: Disables the showing of images in your twitter feed until after you have 'opened' them. Just like it used to be.

user.name: gmyx
user.about:
Most of my skins are for eliminating (as much as possible) white from web sites. White tires my eyes and I use these to repalce them on my most used website. 

I am open to web site suggestions.
